code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import logo from"../img/logo.png";import"../css/Navbar.css";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{LoginContext}from"../context/LoginContext";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Navbar(_ref){let{login}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const{setModalOpen}=useContext(LoginContext);const loginStatus=()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("jwt");if(login||token){return[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/profile",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Profile"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/createPost",children:"Create Post"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{style:{marginLeft:"20px"},to:"/followingpost",children:"My Following"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primaryBtn",onClick:()=>setModalOpen(true),children:"Log Out"})})]})];}else{return[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"SignUp"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signin",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"SignIn"})})]})];}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"",onClick:()=>{navigate("/");}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"nav-menu",children:loginStatus()})]});}
